trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Rialto
There were no other sightings in Rialto on or around August 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out in front of our house playing catch with my two sons. When one of my sons called out "what the heck is that?" So I looked up almost right above us when I caught sight of a strange object floating across the sky. I ran into the house and grabbed my digital camera, and adjusted the settings to get a good look at it. I was estonished to see that it wasnt 1 object but 3 and it was changing shape. I couldnt believe my eyes when I noticed apendages under and over the top object. The UFO continued on a NE path until I lost sight of it. Not even 30 seconds later a helicopter flew past us in the direction of the UFO.
Object Shape: Blimp, Circle, Disc, Egg, Oval, Saturn-like, Sphere, Star-like
Summary: I was out in front of our house playing catch with my two sons. When one of my sons called out "what the heck is that?" So I looked up almost right above us when I caught sight of a strange object floating across the sky.(I have a recording)
